text: @MattHancock If we treat the disease EARLY, we can put an end to #COVID19 deaths. I found with my patients that a regimen of zinc, hydroxychloroquine and azithromycin can prevent the need for hospitalization. People are dying needlessly. Why isn't this information well known? https://t.co/VMJSaNwWx9

entity.description: This page is a timeline of Tweets with the latest information and updates on COVID-19 from experts, journalists, health authorities and other trusted sources from around the world. For more on COVID-19, visit: twitter.com/explore/tabs/covid-19
